definition: to evaporate/(of cooking) to steam/torch made from hemp stalks or bamboo (old)/finely chopped firewood (old)
to steam/to cook in a steamer/to reheat cold food by steaming it
to distill/to break a liquid substance up into components by boiling

sentences.english: It is mounted in a cabinet which connects to the Still Assembly via flexible hoses .
sentences.chinese: 安装在一个真空柜内并和蒸馏器模块用软管相连。

sentences.english: Liquor distil is one of the substantial evidences in origin investigation.
sentences.chinese: 白酒蒸馏器是研究我国起源的重要实物证据之一。

sentences.english: As the vapors rise up and pass over the neck of the still, they condense.
sentences.chinese: 水汽上升经过上面蒸馏器的颈部，并被浓缩。

sentences.english: The company ‘We Make Home-Distilled Vodka’ produces distillers.
sentences.chinese: “我们生产家酿伏特加”公司出产蒸馏器。

sentences.english: His return runs a similar arc to that of many Northeast distillers.
sentences.chinese: 他的回归犹如很多东北蒸馏器上的弧线。
这是一个威士忌蒸馏器。

definition: to brew/to make (wine, vinegar, soybean paste etc) by fermentation
container for holding and pouring water (or other liquid): jug, pitcher, clay jar, jerry can, water bottle etc
